channel.title: Openprot on CHIPS Alliance
channel.description: Recent content in Openprot on CHIPS Alliance

item.title: CHIPS Alliance - Our Vision and Priorities for 2026
item.description:
Dear CHIPS Alliance Community,

As we approach 2026, the CHIPS Alliance is evolving. Over the past few years, we have grown from a collection of ambitious projects into a central hub for open-source silicon innovation. Our vision for 2026 is centered on sustainability, technical rigor, and established trust. We are transitioning from an incubation phase to a mature, community-driven ecosystem focused on high-quality, verifiable IP and robust tooling for design and validation enablement.

item.title: CHIPS Alliance 2025- A Year of Breakthroughs in Open Silicon and the Road Ahead
item.description:
Author: Rob Mains, Executive Director of CHIPS Alliance

CHIPS Alliance is a six-year-old organization that is part of the Linux Foundation, whose mission is to foster collaborative, open source development in the silicon hardware design ecosystem. CHIPS champions all aspects of hardware development including:

  • Chip design architecture
  • Electronic design automation for design entry, design verification, and physical implementation
  • FPGA tools
  • Repository of chip designs and verification design benches
  • Firmware

Artificial intelligence and chip design
